model-value.desc: Model of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use v-model directive

error-message.desc: Validation error message (gets displayed only if 'error' is set to 'true')
examples: Username must have at least 5 characters

no-error-icon.desc: Hide error icon when there is an error

rules.desc: Array of Functions/Strings; If String, then it must be a name of one of the embedded validation rules
examples: :rules="[ (val, rules) => rules.email(val) || 'Please enter a valid email address' ]"

reactive-rules.desc: By default a change in the rules does not trigger a new validation until the model changes; If set to true then a change in the rules will trigger a validation; Has a performance penalty, so use it only when you really need it

lazy-rules.desc: If set to boolean true then it checks validation status against the 'rules' only after field loses focus for first time; If set to 'ondemand' then it will trigger only when component's validate() method is manually called or when the wrapper QForm submits itself

label.desc: A text label that will “float” up above the input field, once the field gets focus

stack-label.desc: Label will be always shown above the field regardless of field content (if any)

hint.desc: Helper (hint) text which gets placed below your wrapped form component

hide-hint.desc: Hide the helper (hint) text when field doesn't have focus

label-color.desc: Color name for the label from the Quasar Color Palette; Overrides the 'color' prop; The difference from 'color' prop is that the label will always have this color, even when field is not focused

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

bg-color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

loading.desc: Signals the user a process is in progress by displaying a spinner; Spinner can be customized by using the 'loading' slot.

clearable.desc: Appends clearable icon when a value (not undefined or null) is set; When clicked, model becomes null

clear-icon.desc: Custom icon to use for the clear button when using along with 'clearable' prop

standout.desc: Use 'standout' design for the field; Specifies classes to be applied when focused (overriding default ones)

label-slot.desc: Enables label slot; You need to set it to force use of the 'label' slot if the 'label' prop is not set

hide-bottom-space.desc: Do not reserve space for hint/error/counter anymore when these are not used; As a result, it also disables the animation for those; It also allows the hint/error area to stretch vertically based on its content

counter.desc: Show an automatic counter on bottom right

rounded.desc: Applies a small standard border-radius for a squared shape of the component

square.desc: Remove border-radius so borders are squared; Overrides 'rounded' prop

item-aligned.desc: Match inner content alignment to that of QItem

autofocus.desc: Focus field on initial component render

for.desc: Used to specify the 'id' of the control and also the 'for' attribute of the label that wraps it; If no 'name' prop is specified, then it is used for this attribute as well

name.desc: Used to specify the name of the control; Useful if dealing with forms; If not specified, it takes the value of 'for' prop, if it exists

maxlength.desc: Specify a max length of model

prepend.desc: Prepend inner field; Suggestions: QIcon, QBtn

append.desc: Append to inner field; Suggestions: QIcon, QBtn

before.desc: Prepend outer field; Suggestions: QIcon, QBtn

after.desc: Append outer field; Suggestions: QIcon, QBtn

label.desc: Slot for label; Used only if 'label-slot' prop is set or the 'label' prop is set; When it is used the text in the 'label' prop is ignored

error.desc: Slot for errors; Enabled only if 'bottom-slots' prop is used; Suggestion: <div>

hint.desc: Slot for hint text; Enabled only if 'bottom-slots' prop is used; Suggestion: <div>

counter.desc: Slot for counter text; Enabled only if 'bottom-slots' prop is used; Suggestion: <div>

loading.desc: Override default spinner when component is in loading mode; Use in conjunction with 'loading' prop

control.desc: Slot for controls; Suggestion QSlider, QRange, QKnob, ...

id.desc: Element id used in the `for` attribute of the field label. Can be used to link the control to the label

emitValue.desc: Function that emits an @input event in the context of the field

clear.desc: When using the 'clearable' property, this event is emitted when the clear icon is clicked

value.desc: The previous value before clearing it

update:model-value.desc: Emitted when the model changes, only when used with 'clearable' or the 'control' scoped slot.

returns.desc: True/false if no async rules, otherwise a Promise with the outcome (true -> validation was a success, false -> invalid models detected)

hasError.desc: Whether the component is in error state
